front.title: Information Model for Wavelength Switched Optical Networks (WSONs) with Impairments Validation

abstract.t: This document defines an information model to support Impairment- Aware (IA) Routing and Wavelength Assignment (RWA) functionality. This information model extends the information model for impairment- free RWA process in WSON to facilitate computation of paths where optical impairment constraints need to considered.
